attributes.action: Recommit to net zero targets of 2030
attributes.additional_details: Commit to this important pledge and create policy that will support the public to buy electric and hybrid cars, incentivise the use of public transport and green travel and fund alternative heating sources
attributes.background: Recommit to the government pledge to ban the sale of petrol and diesel cars, and gas boilers be net zero by 2030. Scrap new plans to push back to 2035

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Keep the promise to ban diesel and petrol cars in 2030
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644662
